bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Combined Designation of PCs with a slow onset and a slow further development. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry da huang 大黃 quoting Tai ding yang sheng zhu lun 泰定養生主論. 14: 滾痰丸…一切無病之人 , 遍身筋骨等處平白疼 痛 , 不能名狀者 , 每服七八十丸 , “The pills to remove phlegm. ...In all those cases where a healthy has pain all over the body and all the time, involving sinews, bones, etc. without being able to give the signs a name, each time ingest 70 to 80 pills”. writes: 滾痰丸…緩病七八十丸 , “The pills to remove phlegm. ...For slow diseases [ingest] 70 to 80 pills
